item.title: Additional Instructions for Making Payments to EPA
item.description:
In addition to the instructions found at Financial Services, the following table provides further information and instructions for payments to EPA for Superfund fees, FOIA fees, travel fees, bankcard fees, and fines and penalties.

Payment Method Payment Instructions
Automated clearing house payments made through Vendor Express

Automated Clearinghouse payments to EPA can be made through the US Treasury using the following information:

US Treasury REX/Cashlink ACH Receiver

ABA: 051036706

Account Number: 310006, Environmental Protection Agency

CTX Format Transaction Code 22 – checking

Physical location of US Treasury Facility:

5700 Rivertech Court

Riverdale, MD 20737

Remittance Express (REX): 1-866-234-5681
Wire transfers made through Fedwire

Wire transfers to EPA can be done through the Federal Reserve Bank of New York using the following information:

ABA: 021030004

Account Number: 68010727

SWIFT address: FRNYUS33

33 Liberty Street

New York, NY 10045

Beneficiary: US Environmental Protection Agency

*Note: Foreign banks must use a United States Bank to send a wire transfer to the US EPA.
Checks from foreign banks with no US branches

Send checks to:

Cincinnati Finance

US EPA, MS-NWD

26 W ML King Drive

Cincinnati, OH 45268-0001
Payments made through Pay.gov   Exit

Payers can use their credit or debit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express & Discover) as well as checking account information to make payments. This option is only available for the following payment types – Superfund, fines and penalties, FOIA, travel, and miscellaneous fees.

Follow these steps to make a payment:

  1. You DO NOT need a user name and password or account.
  2. Enter SFO 1.1 in the form search box on the top left side of the screen.  
  3. Open the form and follow the on-screen instructions.
  4. Select your type of payment from the "Type of Payment" drop down menu.
  5. Based on your selection, the corresponding line will open and no longer be shaded gray.
  6. Enter the docket number, invoice number or other corresponding information into the field.
item.dc:creator: ACox02

item.title: Agreement for Submission of Contract Invoices
item.description:
Release agreement to be signed by contractors in order to participate in EPA's program that will allow contractors to submit their invoices to EPA RTP Finance via email.

  • EPA Agreement for Email Submission of Contract Invoices (PDF)(1 pg, 39 K)
item.dc:creator: cdunton

item.title: Payment Request Form for Grants and Cooperative Agreements
item.description:
EPA Form 190-F-04-001 is used by non-ASAP participants to request payment via electronic funds transfer (EFT).

This form is availble below as a fillable, PDF form or here as a Mircosoft Excel spreadsheet - Payment Request for Grants and Cooperative Agreements.xls(1 pg, 18 K) .

  • Payment Request Form for Grants and Cooperative Agreements (PDF)(1 pg, 38 K)
item.dc:creator: cdunton

item.title: Instructions for EPA Payment Request Form 190-F-04-001
item.description:
Instructions for completing EPA's Payment Request Form used to request payment from EPA for Assistance Agreements or grants.

  • Instructions for EPA Payment Request Form 190-F-04-001 (PDF)(2 pp, 37 K)
